abs: It is shown that Gibbs sampling, making systematic use of an adaptive rejection algorithm proposed by Gilks and Wild, provides a straightforward computational procedure for Bayesian inferences in a wide class of generalized linear and proportional hazards models.
title: Bayesian Inference for Generalized Linear and Proportional Hazards Models via Gibbs Sampling
names: Journal of the Royal Statistical Society Series C Applied Statistics
